xuiPanel
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Panel component.

Usage

as element:
<xui-panel
       [is-collapsed="{boolean}"]
       heading="{string}"
       header-icon="{string}"
       header-icon-counter="{string}"
       is-collapsible="{boolean}"
       collapse-changed="{function}"
       [panel-layout]="{string}">
</xui-panel>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
is-collapsed
(optional)
boolean

Dictates if panel should be collapsed by default.

(default: false)

headingstring

Heading text of the panel.

header-iconstring

Header icon to be shown near the heading.

header-icon-counterstring

Header icon counter to be shown when the panel is collapsed. Must be a valid integer.

is-collapsibleboolean

Expression to indicate if the panel can be collapsed.

collapseChangedfunction

(isCollapsed:Boolean)=>void fired when expand/collapse animation completes.

[panel-layout]string

If attribute equals to "fill" , panel will be as high as its parent. It is important that the parent element has a fixed height. By default, panel will adjust its height corresponding to its internal content.

Example
